  • Method Details

    • initializeMainFrame

      public void initializeMainFrame()

    • initializeSelectedHotelPanel

      public void initializeSelectedHotelPanel()

    • setSidePanelListener

      public void setSidePanelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for all buttons in the side panel of the main frame. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons located in the side panel of mainFrame. This setup allows the side panel buttons to respond to user actions by invoking the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the buttons

    • setHotelSelectedListener

      public void setHotelSelectedListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for all hotel selection buttons in the hotel catalog. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the hotel selection buttons in both the home panel and hotels panel of the mainFrame. Checks if there are any hotels in the catalog (i.e., getnHotels() returns a value greater than 0). Iterates through each hotel button in the catalog and adds the listener to handle actions for each button. This setup allows user interactions with the hotel selection buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the hotel selection buttons

    • setHotelsPanelListener

      public void setHotelsPanelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the buttons in the hotels panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons in the hotels panel of mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the buttons

    • setCreateHotelListener

      public void setCreateHotelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the buttons in the create hotel panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons in the create hotel panel of the hotels panel in mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the buttons

    • setFilterPanelListener

      public void setFilterPanelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the buttons in the filter panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the filter buttons in the filter panel of the hotels panel in mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these filter buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the buttons

    • setSelectedHotelListener

      public void setSelectedHotelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the buttons in the selected hotel panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons in the selected hotel panel of mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the buttons

    • setBookHotelListener

      public void setBookHotelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the booking-related components in the book panel of the selected hotel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the components in the book panel of the selected hotel panel in mainFrame. Additionally, this method assigns the listener to each of the 31 day buttons in the book panel to handle day selection events. This setup allows user interactions with these booking components to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the booking-related components

    • setManageHotelListener

      public void setManageHotelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the management-related buttons in the manage panel of the selected hotel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons in the manage panel of the selected hotel panel in mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these management buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the management-related buttons

    • setManageSubPanelListener

      public void setManageSubPanelListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the buttons in various sub-panels of the manage panel in the selected hotel panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons across multiple sub-panels within the manage panel of the selected hotel in mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these management sub-panel components to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the sub-panel buttons

    • setConfirmModListener

      public void setConfirmModListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the confirmation modification panel in the manage panel of the selected hotel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the buttons in the confirmation modification panel of the manage panel in mainFrame. This setup allows user interactions with these confirmation buttons to be processed by the specified listener.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the confirmation buttons

    • setDateAvailabilityListener

      public void setDateAvailabilityListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the day buttons in the date availability panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the day buttons in the calendar of the date availability panel in the selected hotel panel of mainFrame. The panel contains 31 day buttons, one for each day in a typical month.
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the day buttons in the date availability panel

    • setRoomInfoListener

      public void setRoomInfoListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the room buttons in the room information panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the room buttons in the room view of the room information panel in the selected hotel panel of mainFrame. The number of room buttons is determined by the count of rooms returned by countRooms().
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the room buttons in the room information panel

    • setResInfoListener

      public void setResInfoListener(ActionListener listener)
      Sets the action listener for the reservation buttons in the reservation information panel. This method assigns the provided listener to handle action events for the reservation buttons in the reservation view of the reservation information panel in the selected hotel panel of mainFrame. The number of reservation buttons is determined by the count of reservations returned by countReservations().
      Parameters:
      listener - the action listener to be added to the reservation buttons in the reservation information panel
